I am a **postdoc**toral researcher at the Department of General Psychology, University of **Padova**, Italy. 

My research interests include computational models of **cognition**, **Bayesian** statistics, and **metascience**. I am a member of the [Psicostat](https://psicostat.dpss.psy.unipd.it/){target="_blank"} research group.
:::
